hear/see what your idea is. ~Rue

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Jewelry funshop
messages.msgSnippet: I like http://www.wigjig.com/ .  They show techniques and design ideas (in wigjig university), and also have good prices on sterling wire.  ~Rue OK, this
messages.messageBody:
I like http://www.wigjig.com/ . They show techniques and design ideas (in
wigjig university), and also have good prices on sterling wire. ~Rue

OK, this thread has sparked my interest as I like artsy-craftsy stuff.
I've
been searching the web but could one of you recommend a good site for an
absolute beginner?
Amy Kagey
